author: Kynix @KynixXBT
text: I am leaving Crypto if $BTC, $ETH and Altcoins do not manage to perform in the following days! Why? $XAU has topped, Trump Taco'd, impulsive ATHs for #SP500, #NDQ, and especially #RUSSEL, Rate Cuts and Stop of QT imminent, Altcoin ETFs around the corner. Perfect Conditions!
